name: CHEM 164
title: Physical Chemistry Laboratory
description: Provides laboratory experience and data analysis in the areas of thermodynamics, kinetics, and spectroscopy. Lecture: 1.75 hours; experimental laboratory: 4 hours; computer laboratory: 2 hours.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): CHEM 1C, CHEM 3C, or CHEM 4B; and PHYS 5A and PHYS 5B and PHYS 5C, or PHYS 6A and PHYS 6B and PHYS 6C; and MATH 22 or MATH 23B. CHEM 163A is recommended.

class_notes: Enroll in lab lecture and associated secondary lab
